sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react' import {TaskBarContainer,Grid, Paragraph, Strong, Select,Option, Settings, Button} from "./taskbar.styles"; import {getNumberOfProducts} from "../../../utils/algorithms"; import {BsGridFill} from "react-icons/bs" import {FaListUl } from "react-icons/fa" const TaskBar = () => { const numberOfProducts = getNumberOfProducts(); const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState("ascending"); const [view,setView] = useState("grid"); return ( Sắp xếp Tìm thấy {numberOfProducts} mặt hàng ) } export default TaskBar
